name: Good Job! (itch)
description:
There's no real need to pretend and work anymore... Let's have some more fun and kill her.

______________________________________________________________________________________________

Content Warning: 

  • murder (aka blood and a corpse)
  • mentions of suicide

Features:

  • 7 Dead Ends and 1 True End
  • Playtime: ~ 20 min
  • ~ 3000 words
  • 7 CGs

Controls- Mobile:

Touch screen with one finger - walk around/interact/confirm
Touch screen with two fingers at once - open menu /back

Controls- PC:

Arrowkeys to move
Enter to confirm
Shift to run
Esc-Key to open menu

Credits:

Music:  Stefan Großmann, Chiphead64
Sound Effects: RPG MAKER
Plugin: Jackkel Dragon (Persistent Data Plugin)
